message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth more than you're willing to pay. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counterpropose a price of $10,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and our shared goal of finding a fair price.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,500 is still below my minimum. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which is a fair price considering the value of this product. Let's try to meet in the middle.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand your position and respect the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,750. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our positions.
